name: Bobbo The Telekinetic Gobbo - Ludum Dare 45
name_original: Bobbo The Telekinetic Gobbo - Ludum Dare 45
description:
Run around as a magical goblin, pick up things in a forest and throw them at a bad orc

Use WASD keys for movement, Left Mouse Button to pick up objects, Right Mouse Button to throw them

Made for Ludum Dare 45
